components/LPAboutContact/subtitle.value: I'm not that hard to find, look:

components/LPAboutMe/p/1.value: and I'm a Full Stack developer and Designer with leadership experiences. I combine design with my expertise in coding to transform complex problems into complete and elegant solutions. I'm fluent with Node.js, React and Typescript, with some experience with Python and PHP. My greatest strength is my speed to learn and my sensibility to hear. I always look for harmonizing functionality and elegancy.

components/LPAboutMe/p/3.value: I grew up in Petrópolis, a small city in Rio de Janeiro. Things weren't so easy. Violence was normal. Looking back I realize that I hardly felt heard.

children.value: Was at coding that was able to express myself. To find my voice at 14

components/LPAboutMe/p/3.value: . Later on, when I was 17, Atados contacted to freelance their first international plataform. They are from São Paulo. It dind't take long for me to move there, 286 miles from where I grew up.

components/LPAboutMe/p/4.value: Here I met all kinds of people. Inside Atados I could form great friendships for life. There I met sensible people that not only had given me a space to create, but also tought me the value of a empathic, vulnerable and true relationship.

components/LPAboutMe/p/5.value: Being able to learn how to be a better person helped me to create bridges and not walls. To listen, to feel, to comunicate and ask for help. I'm really happy to, even frightened, decided not go to college risk a dream moving here.

components/LPAboutMe/p/6.value: I play cavaquinho, brazilian banjo and tambourine. So playing samba in the street is my jam, but my favorite place thing in the world is going to beach. Whenever it's possible I take my surfboard with me. To be honest there's little adventures that I wouldn't jump in. Specially those with boards. Skating? I got 2 - Let's do it!

components/LPAboutMe/title/2.value: How I opened my heart to listen

components/LPAboutMe/title/3.value: Oh, and I love to hangout

components/LPFooter/message.value: I designed and developed this website in January 2021

components/LPHero/headline.value: 5 years working to make the world a better place

components/LPHero/subtitle.value: Senior Dev. in love with art

components/LPKindWords/daniel.value: Vini was responsible for building and scaling the website Atados (www.atados.com.br). He managed our team for some years and with him, besides the creation of our platform with an easy to use interface for non-profit organizations, we also built a smart and scalable manageament system that enabled the technology team to be self sustainable for the first time. I hope that we can build more projects together in the future

components/LPKindWords/josias.value: Vinícius is simply one of those people that is completely out of the curve. His skills to manage and developer evolve in way that amazes anyone. Definitly one of the best professionals that I've had the pleasure to work with.

components/LPKindWords/marcos.value: Vinicius surprises anyone with his technical and manageament skills, an excellent professional. Deals with new challenges and problems like everyday steps, it's a professional that every needs.

components/LPKindWords/subtitle.value: From people that worked with me

pages/index/contact.value: Proposals, ideias and kind words are always welcomed :)

project/atados/description.value: I worked as a Full Stack Developer, Designer and Tech Leader. There I led a team of 4 developers for 1 year. Our goal was to create impactful tech solutions in the social responsibility market. Being used by companies like Samsung, Boticário and Via Varejo, our main product, a SASS web app, scaled to more than 150k users. It's the biggest independent volunteering platform in Brazil

project/financas/description.value: Control your own personal finances through an easy and clean interface. The challenge for me was always to put the efforting into registering my expenses. My inspiration here was to create and easy way to do it.

project/financas/title.value: Prototype: App for managing personal finances

project/nexusTypeORMPlugin/description.value: This plugin automatically creates GraphQL types and resolvers transforming your TypeORM models into a GraphQL API

project/pGraphQL/description.value: Lexer, Parser and AST. A study to understand how languages are read and compiled.

whatsapp/hello.value: Hi - I came through your portfolio
